DOC.brief_title: Phase I Study of GW572016 With Topotecan to Treat Advanced Solid Malignancies
DOC.detailed_description: Participants will take GW572016 by mouth daily each cycle (cycles 28 days in length) and will be given Topotecan intravenously on Days 1, 8 and 15. During Cycle 1 participants will be required to spend the evening before Day 1 in the General Clinical Research Center and frequent blood samples will be drawn on Day 1; this schedule will be repeated the evening of Day 6 with the blood samples drawn on Day 7. Participants will have weekly CBCs.
DOC.criteria: Age 18 and older Histologic proof of cancer that is unresectable ANC greater than 1500 u/L PLC greater than 100,000 u/L Total bilirubin less then or equal to ULN AST less than 3 x ULN or AST less than 5 x ULN if liver involvement Creatinine less than 1.5 x ULN Hemoglobin greater than 9 g/dL Echocardiogram with ejection fraction great than 40% Life expectancy of more than 12 weeks
